ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 124
ygData.msgSnippet: I belive thats how the 3rd book was found but I don t know about the 4th. The person said he will tell how he got the book on dec 1st. There are gnomes all
ygData.messageBody:
I belive thats how the 3rd book was found but I don't know about the 4th.
The person said he will tell how he got the book on dec 1st. There are
gnomes all over the world so maybe there is a quest from one of them to get
the books but who knows.

-Dave

At 04:16 PM 10/31/99 -0800, you wrote:
>From: Eron Linver <aeron@...>
>
>The reason we don't know where the book came from is because the book came from
>no where. It was hacked out of the code on the disk. The person does not want
>to banned that is why we don't know where it came from and the information is
>anonymous. But as most hackers, he/she apparently believes in freedom of
>knowledge and shared it with us.
>
